name: Rubber Hunter: Sea World
description:
If you’ve always dreamed of being a pirate, leading your own crew and setting off on daring adventures in search of treasures from the seven seas, then this is the game for you!
You are just a simple pirate that wishes to be a powerful king. As you travel the Seven Seas, you will find many obstacles that stand in your way of becoming the Pirate King and collecting all One Piece pieces. If you want to be the most powerful pirate in the world, there are many ship battles ahead of you!
The Final Pirate Saga is a unique tactical RPG adventure set in an all-new world and filled with familiar faces that any fan will instantly recognize. Explore a vast, open ocean full of legendary treasures. Battle pirate crews and fearsome monsters as you sail for adventure!
-Experience a whole new world of anime
-Gather your crew and battle in the Age of Sailing
-Battle at iconic locations every match comes complete with items to give your team
-Explore the world of anime through the universe
-Battle in iconic locations and enjoy beautiful graphics
-Battle with special items against the fearsome kraken
-Collect and form an ultimate pirate crew with unique skills and personalities
-Collect and evolve
-Replayable missions
-Legendary pirate heroes
The idle RPG world of pirates awaits you! Download for free now!
